caption.center: THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, Respondent, v. SHANTI BROOKER,
Also Known as BROOKER SHANTI, Appellant.

court.center: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of New York, First Department.

opinion.posture: Judgment, Supreme Court, New York County (Bonnie G. Wittner, J.), rendered on or about April 12, 2006, unanimously affirmed.
opinion.attorneys:
Steven Banks, The Legal Aid Society, New York (Eve Kessler of counsel), for appellant.
Robert M. Morgenthau, District Attorney, New York (Elizabeth Squires of counsel), for respondent.
opinion.panel: Before: Lippman, P.J., Andrias, Nardelli, Acosta and DeGrasse, JJ.
